title: Print, "Design for Ornaments, Possibly Candle Holders", 1751
inscribed: Inscribed on print, upper right: IV; lower left: Pr. Germain in. C.P.R.; lower right: j.j. Pasquier es
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Rocaille designs for two ornaments, possibly candle holders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Ornaments, Possibly Candle Holders", 1751.
1751. Engraving on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-259-4.
